Name: RepresentedVariableSchemeName
Description: A name for the RepresentedVariableScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the RepresentedVariableScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the RepresentedVariableScheme. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: RepresentedVariableSchemeReference
Description: Inclusion of an existing RepresentedVariableScheme by reference. TypeOfObject should be set to RepresentedVariableScheme

Name: RepresentedVariableReference
Description: Describes a RepresentedVariable contained in the RepresentedVariableScheme. A RepresentedVariable contains a reference to the Concept and Universe (or ConceptualVariable) as well as the representation of the RepresentedVariable. Representation may be provided in-line or by reference to a managed representation. RepresentedVariables are the core reusable parts of a Variable. RepresentedVariable maps to the GSIM Represented Variable.

Name: RepresentedVariableGroupReference
Description: In-line description of a group of RepresentedVariables. RepresentedVariables may be grouped for a wide range of reasons including conceptual or universe grouping, usage, subject or keyword relationships, or other grouping reason that will assist in the management of a group of RepresentedVariables.
